item.description:
May 2009

Agenda
* Introductions
* Django Dash, http://djangodash.com...
* Speaker

Ivan Kirigin will present Tipjoy, a Django site.

- How to different kinds of twitter accounts in a single model (oauthed, with password, follows @tipjoy, etc.), using a dict in a
PickledObjectField. I call it the "cornichon" pattern.
- How to poll twitter to get the payments fast (enough).
- The recent twitter payments API, and how to use it. I could show an example Django application, and talk about the dozen or so ideas on apps to build.
- How to handle account creation on 3rd party sites within widgets.
- Some really stupid parts of Tipjoy that are now hard to change
(lessons learned kinda thing)


If you are coming by car, you can park in the Green Street garage for $5. If coming by T, take the Red Line to Central Square and walk two blocks to 13 Magazine St. Buzz suite #2 and then walk up the stairs two flights.
item.name: Cambridge Django May Meetup
